abstract: New York City's Citi Bike program resumes service following break for weekend maintenance; organization has still not provided details on what work was being done and why such short notice was given.
lead_paragraph: The New York City bike-sharing program abruptly suspended service for maintenance work on Friday. By Sunday morning, nearly all of the bike stations were operating, a spokeswoman said.

headline.main: Citi Bike Resumes Service After Weekend Maintenance
headline.print_headline: Citi Bike Resumes Service After Weekend Maintenance

snippet: The New York City bike-sharing program abruptly suspended service for maintenance work on Friday. By Sunday morning, nearly all of the bike stations were operating, a spokeswoman said.
